docs.title: mri_coreg
docs.description: mri_coreg performs a linear registration between two volumes using the method compatible with spm_coreg.

docs.title: Z-scale flag
docs.description: Enable 7 dof registration with scaling in Z.

docs.title: XZ Translation and Y Rotation flag
docs.description: For 2D images: uses shifts in x and z and rotation about y (no scale).

docs.title: XY Translation and Z Rotation flag
docs.description: For 2D images: uses shifts in x and y and rotation about z (no scale).

docs.title: XY Trans, Z Rot, XY Scale, XY Shear flag
docs.description: For 2D images: uses shifts in x and y, rotation about z, scale in xy, and xy shear.

docs.title: Reference Mask Volume
docs.description: Mask reference volume with specified mask volume.

docs.title: Moving Mask Volume
docs.description: Mask moving volume with specified mask volume.

docs.title: Output Cost File
docs.description: Save final cost value in specified file.

docs.title: No CRAS0 flag
docs.description: Do not set translation parameters to align centers of mov and ref.

docs.title: Centroid flag
docs.description: Initialize by aligning centroids of mov and ref.

docs.title: No Brute Force flag
docs.description: Do not perform brute force search.

docs.title: Brute Force Limit
docs.description: Set constraint limits for brute force search.

docs.title: Brute Force Samples
docs.description: Set number of samples for brute force search.

docs.title: No Smoothing flag
docs.description: Do not apply smoothing to either ref or mov.

docs.title: Reference FWHM
docs.description: Apply smoothing to ref with specified FWHM.

docs.title: Mov Out of Bounds flag
docs.description: Count mov voxels that are out-of-bounds as 0.

docs.title: Rotation Registration File
docs.description: Convert registration to a pure rotation.

docs.title: Left-Right Reversal Registration
docs.description: Approximate registration if you were to left-right reverse the pixels of the input image.

docs.title: RMS Computation
docs.description: Compute RMS difference between two registrations.

docs.title: Preprocessed Moving Volume
docs.description: Save the mov after all preprocessing steps.

docs.title: Moving Intensity Dither Volume
docs.description: Save the mov intensity dither volume.

docs.title: Check Options Flag
docs.description: Check options and exit without running.

docs.title: mri_coreg
docs.description: mri_coreg performs a linear registration between two volumes using the method compatible with spm_coreg.
